SELECT o.order_no AS num,u.user_name AS name,e.evaluate_content AS content,e.evaluate_time AS etime,g.`goods_id` AS gid,g.`goods_main_img` img FROM evaluate e INNER JOIN users u ON e.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN goods g ON g.`goods_id` = e.goods_id INNER JOIN orders o ON o.order_id = e.order_id
and u.user_name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
and o.order_no LIKE concat('%',#{num},'%')
and e.evaluate_content LIKE concat('%',#{content},'%')

SELECT e.*,u.user_name,u.user_headimg,d.grade_name FROM evaluate e INNER JOIN goods g ON g.`goods_id` = e.goods_id INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_id = e.user_id INNER JOIN growup r ON u.user_id = r.user_id INNER JOIN grade d ON r.growup_sum BETWEEN d.low AND high WHERE g.`goods_id` = #{gid} AND e.evaluate_state = 1
